GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.25 to before v6.0.9
GSD.description:
ipv6: addrlabel: fix infoleak when sending struct ifaddrlblmsg to network

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit 49e92ba5ecd7d72ba369dde2ccff738edd028a47, it was introduced in version v2.6.25 by commit 2a8cc6c89039e0530a3335954253b76ed0f9339a. For more details please see the references link.
